regenerator-runtime

Standalone runtime for Regenerator-compiled generator and async functions.

To import the runtime as a module (recommended), either of the following import styles will work: ```js // CommonJS const regeneratorRuntime = require(“regenerator-runtime”);

// ECMAScript 2015 import regeneratorRuntime from “regenerator-runtime”; ```

To ensure that regeneratorRuntime is defined globally, either of the following styles will work: ```js // CommonJS require(“regenerator-runtime/runtime”);

// ECMAScript 2015 import “regenerator-runtime/runtime”; ```

To get the absolute file system path of runtime.js, evaluate the following expression: js require("regenerator-runtime/path").path
